name: Monstervania
description:
The monsters of Monstervania have kicked out their old king, Lil Rex. But where is a good monster to go? Determined to reclaim the lost throne, Lil Rex fuses with a human to lead a one monster rebellion against the new regime and get an apology out every single citizen. 

Compatible with an Xbox controller and keyboard. 

We're looking for feedback on performance and any issues you may experience. Feedback on game play is also welcome. We hope you enjoy this early demo.
